input: A chef preparing a dish in a rustic kitchen with soft lighting.

A skilled chef, clad in worn linen and flour dusted apron, kneads dough with focused intensity at a wooden countertop. In the background, shelves laden with jars of herbs and spices add to the rustic charm. The image captures the quiet intimacy and warmth of traditional culinary craft.
